did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club scrapbook collection

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: The 12 scrapbooks document the club's activities and each scrapbook covers a range of years beginning in 1974. The collection is dated from 1974 to 2010 and is contained in 7 boxes.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Women's Club of Greater Reston (Reston, Va.)

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club was founded in 1969 as a women's social organization. The Club's purpose is to extend a friendly, helping hand, to offer the opportunity to make new friends, find camaraderie, and enjoy a variety of creative, social, and recreational activities from September through June. The club currently meets under the name Women's Club of Greater Reston.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The Special Collections and Archives also holds the Planned Community Archives and other personal papers and organizational records that document Reston, Virginia, and other planned communities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: 12 scrapbooks that contain newsclippings and photographs of the activities of the Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club. The collection is dated from 1974 to 2010 and is contained in 7 boxes.

The collection consists of scrapbooks from the Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club. Included in the scrapbooks are photographs, newsclippings, programs and other items from different years in the Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club's history.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club Scrapbook Collection must be obtained from Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing and EAD markup completed in November 2013 by Kerry Mitchell.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Greater Reston Newcomers and Neighbors Club Scrapbook Collection, C0234, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by the Women's Club of Greater Reston on April 4, 2013.
